{{title|1=operator=={{small|(ranges::join_with_view::''iterator'')}}}}
{{cpp/ranges/join_with_view/navbar}}

{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++23|1=
friend constexpr bool operator==( const /*iterator*/&amp; x, const /*iterator*/&amp; y )
    requires std::is_reference_v&lt;InnerBase&gt; &amp;&amp;
             std::equality_comparable&lt;ranges::iterator_t&lt;Base&gt;&gt; &amp;&amp;
             std::equality_comparable&lt;ranges::iterator_t&lt;InnerBase&gt;&gt;;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Compares whether the iterators {{c|x}} and {{c|y}} are equal. They only compare equal if their {{rlp|/|outer iterators}} and {{rlp|/|inner iterators}} compare equal respectively.

{{cpp/hidden friend|{{tt|std::ranges::join_with_view::''iterator''}}{{sep}}{{tt|&lt;Const&gt;}}}}

{{cpp/note synthesized eq}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|x, y|iterators to compare}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{box|{{c/core|x.}}{{rlpsi|/#outer_it_}}{{nbspt}}{{c/core|1=== y.}}{{rlpsi|/#outer_it_}}{{nbspt}}{{c/core|&amp;&amp; x.}}{{rlpsi|/#inner_it_}}{{nbspt}}{{c/core|1=== y.}}{{rlpsi|/#inner_it_}}}}
